translations: n.赛艇会，划船比赛（regatta 的复数）

sentences.sentence: One of the top domestic regattas in the UK.
sentences.translation: 在英国的最高的国内赛船会之一。

sentences.sentence: The yacht timer is used to time the start of regattas.
sentences.translation: 游艇计时器用于时的帆船赛开始。

sentences.sentence: Sail Blind teams have competed throughout the world in regattas.
sentences.translation: 各盲人帆船赛队在世界各国的帆船赛事大展风采。
